body.name: Isabel Fay ph Balanced Feminine Intimate Foam Wash gentle and safe for sensitive skin
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 29 mins
features: SENSITIVE CARE: This pH balanced foam wash is perfect for women that experience irritation from normal intimate cleansers and for those that experience regular dryness, irritation, or infections.
Made in USA with CLEAN INGREDIENTS: Our hypoallergenic, fragrance free foam wash contains no parabens, carcinogens, sulfates, dyes or fragrances.
EASY APPLICATION: No mess, no aerosol, foam dispenser dispenses light, foaming wash
OPTIMUM pH LEVEL: At a 4.2 pH, this foam wash matches vaginal pH levels, unlike other feminine washes, which can be harmful to sensitive skin.

KEY INGREDIENTS: Lactic acid adjusts pH levels, calms irritation, gently lifts off dead skin cells to reveal newer, fresher, smoother skin, and has amazing skin hydrating properties. Aloe leaf juice has several anti-inflammatory as well as some antibacterial components.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice unscented foam wash
reviews.reviewText: This foam wash works great. It is unscented and very lightweight. So far I have had no adverse reactions, it seems to be great for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh and Easy
reviews.reviewText: This product is gentle, yet effective in keeping me feeling fresh and clean all day long. The foaming formula is so easy to use. Not only does it leave me feeling refreshed, but it also has a pleasant scent that is not overpowering.I recommend this product to anyone looking for a gentle and effective feminine wash. I will definitely be repurchasing in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and doesn’t irritate my skin
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried many feminine washes before, but I’ve never before used one that comes out as foam. Usually, I use a gel/liquid, but I was pleasantly surprised with how simple it was to use this foam.With one pump, there is a nice amount of foam, but I personally use two pumps for cleansing. It lathers relatively well, but I would prefer a little more lather than it provides. It is soft and nonirritating on my skin and after rinsing, I do feel fresh and clean. It seems to keep bacterial smells at bay as well throughout the day.I don’t really like the scent, however. For the most part, it has very little smell to it. But there is a slight glue scent that comes from it while cleansing. After rinsing, it seems to go away, but I don’t really enjoy the smell while I’m using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mild and cleansing, with no irritation
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice feminine wash. I like the idea that it's paraben-free, and contains some natural ingredients aimed at reducing inflammation and calming irritation. This was important to me, as I have a history of reacting badly to some products, and I'm very careful with what I'll put on my skin these days.The bottle's pump action works very smoothly and dispenses a light foam. It's unscented, works well, and rinses off well, without any residual stickiness or greasiness. I've been impressed (and relieved) to find that I've been able to use this intimate wash daily in the shower, and I've had no irritation or adverse effects from it.The price is perhaps a little on the high side, but this is a good product, and I'd trust it much more than some of the cheaper, highly-scented feminine washes on the market. Happy to give this one a 5-star review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is unscented. It just has a normal clean feel to it. I have it next to my bidet and Have used it regularly. I use this along with some lumi deodorant and I'm super fresh all day! On the other hand I must say I use 2 different washes for my face ( one for face one for eye makeup) and the other night I accidentally pumped some of this instead of my eye makeup remover that I also have in a pump. Since I already had some on my hand I decided just to use it on my eyes anyways I didn't want to waste it. It worked great !!lol . I guess since it's for sensitive parts it had no harsh ingredients so my eyes did not get irritated. So multiuse !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and fragrance free!
reviews.reviewText: I like the foaming application of this wash and the fact that it doesn’t have irritating fragrance, but leaves you smelling fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great intimate foam wash
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Amazon review this product is very convenientAmazon review this product is very convenient it’s fragrance free it balances your ph it’s a very gentle formula

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the downstairs
reviews.reviewText: It's a delicate topic, but I tend to have a lot of... odor... downstairs. I've tried various scented products that usually just make things worse. This unscented PH balancing wash is the first thing that really seems to help! It really doesn't have any scent, but everything downstairs feels fresh, it's not irritating (even when some of it accidentally got... inside... it's intended for external use but it's nice to know that it didn't cause any problems internally either!), and I haven't had nearly the odor issues that I usually have when I'm hot and sweaty. I've been using it twice a week and very happy with it!
